api_list.name: Ranked World Crime cities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ranked-crime-cities.p.rapidapi.com/Kc4Qth/ranked_crime_cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ranked-crime-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get city by filter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ranked-crime-cities.p.rapidapi.com/Kc4Qth/ranked_crime_cities?Name=value/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ranked-crime-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ranked-crime-cities.p.rapidapi.com/Kc4Qth/ranked_crime_cities?Name=value/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ranked-crime-cities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
